footerAsk: Are you interested in working with me
introduction: I'm a frontend developer based in Portugal, I'll help you build beautiful websites.
projectsLabel: These are some of my projects!
menuDigitalDescription: Interactive digital menu platform designed to optimize the customer experience, allowing detailed visualization of dishes and establishment information.
travizcoDescription: Travizco app website, featuring responsive design and a showcase of its main features.
appPosDescription: Mobile Business Intelligence (BI) application for business management, offering analytical dashboards and real-time performance metric monitoring.
aboutMeSubTitle: Bridging the gap between learning and doing: focused on delivering clean, functional, and user-centered results.
aboutMeParagraph1: Hi! My name is Hugo, I'm 27 years old and I'm passionate about <0>Frontend</0> development. My academic journey took place at the Polytechnic Institute of Viana do Castelo, where I completed my degree in <1>Computer Engineering</1>, a fundamental step to consolidate my technical and problem-solving foundations.
aboutMeParagraph2: Throughout my journey, I've had the privilege of joining teams in renowned companies such as <0>Tlantic</0> and <1>eDreams ODIGEO</1>. These internship experiences allowed me to face real challenges at scale and understand the importance of scalability and user experience.
aboutMeParagraph3: Currently, I focus my energy and creativity at <0>ImpactZero</0>, where I work daily to transform ideas into intuitive, clean, and functional interfaces. I'm always looking for new technologies and best practices to elevate the quality of the code I deliver.
tlanticDescription: Design and development of a mobile application dedicated to inventory logistics management. The solution allowed real-time stock consultation, detailed item analysis, and monitoring of commercial performance metrics.
edreamsDescription: Development of an administrative backoffice for a Digital Wallet solution. Focused on user management (CRUD), financial flow control, and real-time exchange rate parameterization.
fisDescription: Development of a credit flow management interface, allowing the analysis, approval, or rejection of requests. Implementation of document management features, real-time comment system, and decision-support metric visualization.
impactZeroDescription: Responsible for the development and maintenance of the Travizco platform's digital ecosystem, including the management backoffice, the institutional website, and the implementation of interactive digital menus.
